description: Juicy charred corn, fresh tomato, cucumber, fluffy brown rice and black beans make this colourful Mexican-inspired bowl an easy choice for lunch or dinner.
keywords: Rice bowl,Quick & easy lunch,Jan Feb 2022,Healthier Easier
name: Mexican-Inspired Black Bean & Brown Rice Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 corn cob, husks and silks removed
0.5 cup Macro Organic original corn chips

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a barbecue or chargrill pan with oil and heat over medium heat. Cook corn for 8 minutes, turning, or until lightly charred and tender. When cool enough to handle, cut kernels from cob, using a small, sharp knife.
Arrange rice, corn, beans, tomato and cucumber in a bowl. Top with yoghurt and sprinkle with paprika and coriander. Serve with corn chips.
